data.name: SEN.TUR.
data.detailed_description:
Aliens are invading and it's up to you to defend the planet.

Defeat enemy aliens with your low orbit defense turret. The more enemies you defeat, the stronger they become in this endless assault. Defeating enemies is rewarded with points which you can use to upgrade your turret.

The turret is composed of 4 major parts: the Chamber, the Action, the Barrel and the Modifier. Each part adds a unique effect to the projectiles.

Good Luck and Godspeed.
data.about_the_game:
Aliens are invading and it's up to you to defend the planet.

Defeat enemy aliens with your low orbit defense turret. The more enemies you defeat, the stronger they become in this endless assault. Defeating enemies is rewarded with points which you can use to upgrade your turret.

The turret is composed of 4 major parts: the Chamber, the Action, the Barrel and the Modifier. Each part adds a unique effect to the projectiles.

Good Luck and Godspeed.
data.short_description: Defend the planet from endless waves of alien ships in this retro arcade shooter. Craft the turret to best fend off the alien assault with shotgun, explosive and many more modifiers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 235 MB available space
  • Sound Card: onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

  • Storage: 297 MB available space
  • Sound Card: onboard
